title: Like other people
creator_credit: Kestrel Films (Australia), Irving Teitelbaum and Paul Morrison
brief_description: This film depicts many aspects of the lives of handicapped adults living in a residential home run by the Spastic Society. It centres on the lives of Willie and Margaret, and shows their desire for as normal a life as possible. Highlights the need to carefully consider how society treats disabled people. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
